content.raw: +1, I briefly discussed this with @\_jrivero\_ and one solution for passing the codecov token to Jenkins seems to be dropping a file with the token directly into the filesystem. Some ignition libraries like GUI and rendering will also need to do this through Jenkins because they can't run GPU tests in Pipelines.
content.html: +1, I briefly discussed this with @_jrivero_ and one solution for passing the codecov token to Jenkins seems to be dropping a file with the token directly into the filesystem. Some ignition libraries like GUI and rendering will also need to do this through Jenkins because they can't run GPU tests in Pipelines.
